Template tag libraries¶

This application provides several template tags packaged into libraries.

  • Assign
    • assign
  • Counter
    • counter
  • Heading
    • headingcontext
  • Javascript
    • javascript_assign
    • javascript_render
    • javascript_reset
  • Replace
    • replace
